original_text: If we assay to commune with thee, wilt thou be grieved? but who can withhold himself from speaking?
korean_text: 누가 네게 말하면 네가 싫증을 내겠느냐, 누가 참고 말하지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If we assay to commune with thee
but who can withhold himself from speaking?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 누가 말하는 것을 자신이 참을 수 있겠습니까?
